metadata.name: Kakaire Muhammed TTH UK Water Well Africa
metadata.description:
üé®**Orphan children with shattered lives in an orphanage in Uganda have produced their own NFT**
üíßEach one of the NFT water drop characters drawn by an orphan will help to build 1 Water Well.
üíØ% of all proceeds from the sale will be spent on the orphanage and the water well
‚≠êThe name of the purchaser and the NFT art will be printed on the water well
[Click for More Details](https://www.timetohelp.org.uk/hopedrops/)
![Markdown Here logo](https://www.timetohelp.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/t.gif)
[Watch](https://vimeo.com/manage/videos/707880632)
![Markdown Here logo](https://www.timetohelp.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Kakaire.png)
**About the Artist**
_I am Kakaire Muhammed.I'm a Ugandan and aged 17 years.I'm an orphan,and I stay in the Mayuge district.I study at Ummul Qura Education and Orphanage Centre in primary seven.I prefer completing my studies abroad.My mother and father died when I was 10 years old.I stay with my grandmother,who is old,unable to pay my school fees_
